Test Case Description: Verify that the billing history displays past and current bills with accurate due dates and amounts.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Review the billing history for past and current bills.
Expected Result: Billing history displays accurate information for each bill with correct due dates and amounts.

Test Case Description: Verify that users can add or edit payment methods such as credit cards or bank accounts.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Click on the Payment Method section.
3. Add or edit a payment method.
Expected Result: User is able to successfully add or edit payment methods.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Pay Now button allows the user to make an immediate payment.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Click on the Pay Now button next to a bill and follow the steps to make a payment.
Expected Result: Pay Now button allows the user to make a payment, and a confirmation is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Download Bill button allows the user to download the bill in PDF format.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Click on the Download Bill button for any bill and save the file.
Expected Result: Download Bill button successfully downloads the bill in PDF format.

Test Case Description: Verify that payment methods can be successfully updated or changed.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Navigate to the Payment Method section.
3. Update an existing payment method.
Expected Result: Payment method is successfully updated and saved.

Test Case Description: Verify that the bill due date is displayed correctly next to each bill.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Verify the due dates displayed next to each bill.
Expected Result: Bill due dates are displayed accurately next to each bill.

Test Case Description: Verify that the spending trends graph/chart displays accurate data over time.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Check the graph/chart section for spending trends over time.
Expected Result: Spending trends graph/chart shows correct and updated data over time.

Test Case Description: Verify that all navigation links (Billing History, Payment Options, Bill Settings) are functional and redirect to the correct sections.
Pre-Conditions: User is logged in and on the Billing page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Billing page.
2. Click on each navigation link (Billing History, Payment Options, Bill Settings) and verify redirection.
Expected Result: All navigation links work as expected and redirect to the correct sections.
